content: **knitted scarf for men in drops air piece is knitted in rib ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #almondwhisperscarf drops design pattern ai-546 yarn group c or a + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m m/l piece measures approx width = 20-25 cm length = 180-200 cm **yarn** drops air from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 150-200 g colour 55 light beige **needles** drops single pointed needles size 4 5 mm **knitting gauge** 18 stitches in width and 24 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm remember needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles
